avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.data

Class LinkDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.data.LinkDataSource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CapacityLinkData, FFSpdLinkData, LinkFileSource, NumLanesLinkData, TTLinkData, VolumeLinkData

    public abstract class LinkDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    The LinkDataSource class provides an input source for the LinkDataRule. The key method is getData(avdta.network.link.Link, int), which is used for visualization purposes. It also contains a name and description method for the user interface.
